text: Ezɨ Moses kamaghɨn a ikaragha ghaze, “Kɨ nɨ ategh mangɨ, dughiar kamra kɨ nɨ bagh Ikiavɨra Itir God ko mɨkemeghtɨ, gurumɨn bereziba mangɨ, nɨ ko nɨn ingangarir gumaziba ko nɨn gumazamiziba ategham. Nɨ orakigh, nɨ ua e gifaran markɨ, egh kamaghɨn mɨkɨman kogh suam, en gumazamiziba mangɨ uan Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn ofa damuan kogham. Bar markɨ.”
